scripts.build: cd react-pml-frontend && npm ci && npm run build && cp -r build ../node_backend/client
scripts.start: cd node_backend && npm ci && npm run server
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd node_backend && npm run dev" " cd react-pml-frontend && npm start"
scripts.devLocal: concurrently "cd node_backend && npm run local" "cd react-pml-frontend && npm start"
scripts.production: git fetch origin main && git reset --hard origin/main && rm -rf node_backend/node_modules && cd node_backend && npm ci && cd ../react-pml-frontend && rm -rf node_modules && npm ci && npm run build && cp -r build ../node_backend/client && cd ../node_backend && npm run server
